{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-06T20:15:13.000Z", "description": "

We are working with the Senior manager of a life sciences company that is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) who will be responsible for supporting Linux and Kubernetes based deployments and Google Cloud Platform. 


Qualifications: 


  • At least 3+ years of experience supporting infrastructure and services in public cloud environments (GCP).
  • Demonstrable experience with automation and orchestration to enable
  • Accelerated infrastructure, application and software configuration deployment
  • Automated response to alerts or indicators of performance issues
  • Infrastructure as code
  • Reliability \u2013 driving fault detection and correction, performance and uptime at a global scale
  • Observability \u2013 instrument systems to gain visibility and understanding of how systems are performing and detecting anomalous behavior
  • Deep understanding Linux/Unix system internals
  • Working knowledge of network protocols and network based services, including routing, network load balancing and web proxy appliances / applications
  • Experience building and supporting containerized application technologies including Docker, kubernetes
  • Familiarity with CI/CD tools and deployment processes, GitLab a strong preference
  • Proficient with various programming languages such as Python/Java/Go for building automation or integration with APIs
  • Passion for eliminating repetitive manual processes using automation, including a focus on writing detailed solution specifications, best practices/standards documentation, operating procedures, run books, etc.
  • Hands-on experience with Kafka, Active MQ, IBM MQ, Amazon RDS, Amazon Auroroa desirable.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, should be capable of working with cross functional technical and business teams and varying levels of management
